value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Great job, everyone! Not only did we
finish our mission, but no one was
hurt! I'm so glad.$k$p$WmMPID_オーシン,ch07_07_Othin_M_Normal,Face|You kidding? Come on, like those
bandits had half a chance against the
Fiana Freeblades!$k$p$WmMPID_タニア,ch07_08_Tania_F_Normal,Face|Oh yeah? They looked like they had
better odds than that against you...$k$pAt least until Mareeta bailed you out.$k$p$WmMPID_マリータ,ch07_06_Mareeta_F_Normal,Face|That was nothing. Credit my mother's
tactics for putting me in position.$k$p$WmMPID_エーヴェル,ch07_09_Evel_F_Normal,Face|The credit goes to our teamwork
most of all.$k$pBut let's delay the celebration until
we've reached the castle. Another
ambush could find us at any time.$k$p$WmMPID_タニア,ch07_08_Tania_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|What is it, Tanya? Have you spotted
something in the wilderness?$k$p$WmMPID_タニア,ch07_08_Tania_F_Normal,Face|No, nothing like that. I'm just noticing
that this land looks...worked.$k$p$WmMPID_エーヴェル,ch07_09_Evel_F_Normal,Face|Good eye. The slope of that hill there
does look man-made.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Now that you mention it, I do believe
this area was plotted for farmland.$k$pIt seems that banditry and a flooding
river have put those plans on hold for
the time being, however.$k$p$WmMPID_マリータ,ch07_06_Mareeta_F_Normal,Face|That explains why it's abandoned.$k$p$WmMPID_オーシン,ch07_07_Othin_M_Normal,Face|Shame to let all this good sunlight
and fresh water go to waste.$k$p$WmMPID_タニア,ch07_08_Tania_F_Normal,Face|You know... That's a great point!
Prince Alfonse! Why don't we
handle this place ourselves?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|You want to use the Heroes...to
clear the land?$k$p$WmMPID_タニア,ch07_08_Tania_F_Normal,Face|Think of what we could build... Not
just a farm—a whole village!$k$p$WmMPID_エーヴェル,ch07_09_Evel_F_Normal,Face|She's right. With proper irrigation and
logging, a village here could thrive.$k$p$WmMPID_オーシン,ch07_07_Othin_M_Normal,Face|Somebody say logging? Stand back!
These arms are made for chopping!$k$p$WmMPID_マリータ,ch07_06_Mareeta_F_Normal,Face|I'd be happy to help with some good,
wholesome work like this.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Are you sure? There's no shortage of
important work for Heroes.$k$p$WmMPID_タニア,ch07_08_Tania_F_Normal,Face|This is important too! And we're
happy to do it.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Then that settles it. Don't hesitate to
let us know if there is anything you
need, all right?$k$p$WmMPID_タニア,ch07_08_Tania_F_Normal,Face|You got it! Don't worry—we'll have
this place bustling in no time!$k$p
